content:
NAME DESCRIPTION
ENABLED Whether the Enedis module is enabled or not.Default: false
CRON A Quartz-type cron expression, specifying the frequency in which the Enedis module tries to fetch data from the Enedis API.Default: 0 0 6 * * ?
MAX_DEVICES The total number of Enedis devices that can be registered in estehesis EDGE.Default: 1000
PAST_DAYS_INIT The number of days in the past to fetch data from the Enedis API for a newly registered device.Default: 30
CLIENT_ID The client ID to use when connecting to the Enedis API.Default: esthesis-edge
CLIENT_SECRET The client secret to use when connecting to the Enedis API.Default: esthesis-edge
